definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: To simulate the Force, technicians hid devices on "Kenobi's" person.
sentences.chinese: 为了模拟原力，技术人员在“克诺比”身上藏了仪器。

sentences.english: Many techie toys are wallet-friendly at under $30.
sentences.chinese: 许多技术人员的玩具钱包友好在30美元以下。

sentences.english: And they say there are 12 solar cells built into its wings.
sentences.chinese: 技术人员称，飞机的两翼内置有12块太阳能电池。

sentences.english: The soldiers and the technician were inside the K21 when it fell into a reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 当它进入水库时，士兵们和技术人员都在K21里面。

sentences.english: It is composed of the original management, scientific research, sales and skilled technical workers of DOFAMA.
sentences.chinese: 由原东方电工科研，营销，管理层，技术人员组成。

sentences.english: Be able to mentor and train other technical staff on troubleshooting skills.
sentences.chinese: 能够指导和培训其他技术人员在故障诊断方面的技能。

sentences.english: Technicians finally located the breakages after some seven hours of investigation.
sentences.chinese: 经技术人员数小时的阿排查所有断点都已经被找到。

sentences.english: The people with the appropriate domain knowledge are often non-technical.
sentences.chinese: 具有适当领域知识的人常常是非技术人员。

sentences.english: Non-engineers often don't understand software development, and view it as a black-box art.
sentences.chinese: 非技术人员通常不懂软件开发，视它为黑盒技术。

sentences.english: The technician was cueing a digital video clip on his monitor.
sentences.chinese: 技术人员正在把一段数码影像连接到显示器中。

sentences.english: Article 53 The State establishes the system of continuing education for agricultural professional technicians.
sentences.chinese: 第五十三条国家建立农业专业技术人员继续教育制度。

sentences.english: However, there is a difference in annual bonuses between sale representatives and specialists.
sentences.chinese: 然而，销售代表和技术人员的年奖是有所不同的。

sentences.english: The company has 112 employees including 8 technical staffs.
sentences.chinese: 企业现有职工112人，技术人员8人。

sentences.english: With her into the Tubo Kingdom of the waiter, many people are process technicians.
sentences.chinese: 随她入吐蕃的侍者，不少人是工艺技术人员。

sentences.english: The professional technology personnel in the hospital has the lab technician is graduation of technical secondary school only.
sentences.chinese: 医院里的专业技术人员只有化验员是中专毕业的。

definition: to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
to storm a strategic pass/fig. to tackle a key problem
